About Us

Everyone here at the Grand Overlook Hotel prides themselves on their customer service. We have been taking care of the luxury stay needs of the area for over 100 years. Many of our staff are generational workers who love our area so much they can not stay away. Enjoy the views from our large and welcoming communal study and work area with its wonderful views, warm hearths and natural lighting. Try out our sprawling hedge maze or enjoy some skiing. Treat yourself to our wonderful kitchen staffed with extraordinary chefs from across the globe. Relax in you room or just spend time exploring the vast hotel. Don't forget to check out the events hosted in our signature ballroom, the Gold Room. Please come join us for a great time. We hope that you never want to leave!
